meanings.definition: A person who plays the trombone.
meanings.sent1: The talented trombonist performed a solo at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The trombonist joined the band and played beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The trombonist accidentally played a funny tune during practice.
meanings.sent4: Her trombone skills made her stand out as a trombonist among the musicians.
meanings.sent5: The young trombonist practiced diligently to become a skilled player.

meanings.definition: One who is skilled in playing the trombone.
meanings.sent1: The experienced trombonist led the brass section with expertise.
meanings.sent2: As a trombonist, he was known for his exceptional performances.
meanings.sent3: The trombonist jokingly claimed to be the best player in the band.
meanings.sent4: His precision and control marked him as a top trombonist in the orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The renowned trombonist inspired many young musicians with his talent.
